Package imagingbook.pub.color.edge

Class CannyEdgeDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.color.edge.ColorEdgeDetector
      • imagingbook.pub.color.edge.CannyEdgeDetector
  • public class CannyEdgeDetector
extends ColorEdgeDetector
    This class implements a Canny edge detector for grayscale and RGB images. The edge detector is "lazy" in the sense that it performs local non- maximum suppression and edge tracing only when the results are explicitly queried (by the methods getEdgeBinary() and getTraces()).
    Version:
    2021/11/26, 2022/03/22 added parameter annotations for dialogs
